pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pytlsdPython transparent bindings for LSD (Line Segment Detector)Bindings over the original C implementation of LSD, that allows to change the different thresholds involved and to provide custom image gradientes in order to compute the method with stronger features.![](resources/example.jpg)## Install```git clone --recursive https://github.com/ibaiGorordo/pytlsd.gitcd pytlsdpip3 install -r requirements.txtpip3 install .```## Execution```python3 tests/test.py```
